attributes.action: Make Netflix and Amazon Prime free for all during the COVID-19 Crisis.
attributes.additional_details: It will be essential to keep the nation entertained during the long days ahead.
attributes.background: Make Netflix and Amazon Prime free for all during the COVID-19 Crisis.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

This would be a decision for the individual companies, not the UK Government or Parliament.
